name: A Camping Story
description:
Welcome to the wonderful world of 'A Camping Story', a survival / crafting game that has you scrambling to gather your resources for the brutal night ahead, during which the zombies roam. Featuring a day/night system, dynamically daily spawning resources, a 15 minute long 'day', zombies, deer, bears and much more in this miniature open world.

Created for the Godot Wild Jam #23, the theme of this jam was 'Tiny World', this game was partly inspired by a camping trip that I just recently took to Moab, Utah. (There were no zombies though)

CONTROLS:

Move Character - Arrow keys or 'WASD'

Interact with Object - Get close to the object and click on with left mouse with the appropriate tool (the pickaxe will not cut down trees for example)

Place Object - Place with left mouse button

Change Item - Either the the numbers '1-6' for each respective inventory slot or right click on the object in the bottom inventory menu

Crafting - Click on the two object that you want to craft together in the inventory menu system
